ProjectsArray.title: Weather App
ProjectsArray.description: My weather app, developed with Python, seamlessly integrates both front-end and back-end functionalities. Powered by data from openweathermap.org API, it provides real-time weather updates and forecasts for any location worldwide. Users can easily access current weather conditions, temperature trends, wind speed, and more, all presented through a user-friendly interface designed with Python's capabilities in mind.

ProjectsArray.title: Wix E-commerce Website
ProjectsArray.description: Welcome to Haanim's Closet, your premier destination for elegant abayas and essentials for Muslim women, thoughtfully crafted with Wix. Discover a curated collection that celebrates modesty and grace, offering a seamless shopping experience that honors your values and enhances your style.

ProjectsArray.title: Wix Portfolio
ProjectsArray.description: Welcome to Haanim's Portfolio, a beautifully crafted Wix site showcasing a journey of creativity and passion. Explore a captivating collection of works that blend artistic vision with meticulous detail, offering a glimpse into the heart of an inspired creator.

ProjectsArray.title: WordPress Ecommerce Website
ProjectsArray.description: Welcome to Shank Accessories, an exquisite eCommerce destination crafted with WordPress, where elegance and sophistication define every piece. Our meticulously designed platform offers a seamless shopping experience, bringing you closer to the finest jewelry and accessories that blend timeless beauty with contemporary flair.

ProjectsArray.title: Capstone Project
ProjectsArray.description: A full-stack e-commerce website is a comprehensive online platform that facilitates buying and selling goods and services. It includes features like product browsing, secure checkout, order management, and payment processing, utilizing both front-end and back-end technologies for seamless functionality and user experience.

ProjectsArray.title: Age to days
ProjectsArray.description: An age-to-days converter is a useful utility for transforming an individual's age into the corresponding number of days, offering a swift and convenient method to express age in an alternative time unit. A simple and easy age to days convertor using basic javascript.

Resumearray.description: As a former student at Life Choices Coding Academy, my initial reservations about this field have evolved into a genuine enjoyment, and I find myself immersed in the learning process. Despite not being an initial consideration, my experience has been enriching, exposing me to a plethora of new concepts that have sparked a growing interest within me. The academy has become a dynamic environment where I not only learn but also cultivate a newfound passion for the world of coding and technology.

Throughout my high school journey, I delved into an extended and more profound realm of learning, exploring a wealth of new knowledge. Ultimately, I successfully matriculated from South Peninsula High School, achieving a Bachelorâ€™s Pass, a testament to my dedication to education. Notably, I excelled in Afrikaans, Life Skills, and History, earning distinctions in these subjects.

TestimonialsArray.name: Ammara Hoosen
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim Pietersen is not only a pleasant individual to work with, but she radiates warmth and positivity where ever she goes. She is a hard-working, dedicated and intelligent person. No matter how hectic or challenging the situation, she maintains an unwavering sense of composure and always finds a way to uplift those around her. I wholeheartedly recommend her.

TestimonialsArray.name: Aakeefah Jones
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: I've had the honour of working with Haanim - she breaks barriers in IT with her expertise and resilience. Her dedication fosters inclusivity and inspires others, leaving an indelible mark on the tech landscape.

TestimonialsArray.name: Ni-shaat Gafieldien
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim's worth ethic is truly something worthy of praise. She excels in every task delegated to her due to her drive and determination. Though she is determined to succeed, Haanim also emphasizes team work and synergy. I've had the privilege of working with Haanim in the past and I look forward to working with her again.

TestimonialsArray.name: Niyaaz Daniels
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Haanim, and I can confidently say that she is an outstanding web developer. Her technical proficiency, attention to detail, and creative approach set her apart in the field. Haanim consistently delivers high-quality work, displaying a remarkable ability to turn complex requirements into sleek and user-friendly web applications. I highly recommend Haanim for her expertise, professionalism, and dedication to excellence in web development.

TestimonialsArray.name: Luqmaan Toefy
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim Pietersen is a phenomenal fullstack developer, seamlessly blending creativity and technical expertise to bring innovative solutions to life. Her keen eye for detail and commitment to quality consistently elevate our projects to new heights. Beyond her professional acumen, Haanim's warm demeanor and collaborative spirit make every workday a pleasure, turning colleagues into friends and creating a truly harmonious work environment.

TestimonialsArray.name: Unity Demas
TestimonialsArray.title: Colleague
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim, with her exceptional work ethic and unwavering dedication, consistently stands out as a hardworking and committed classmate who sets the bar high by tirelessly striving for academic excellence and aiming for the highest marks in every undertaking. Beyond her impressive academic pursuits, she radiates positivity with her pleasant and amiable soul, making her not only a valuable asset in the pursuit of knowledge but also a delightful presence that contributes significantly to the overall camaraderie and uplifting atmosphere within the academic community.
